page.title: 06HOUSING IN THE AREA
page.content: In East Chiltington there are about twenty council houses and five bungalows.Down Novington Lane is an old building called Novington Manor. There are also four semi-detached houses and two farms.In Lower Burrells there are about sixteen semi-detached houses and two detached bungalows. There are three farmhouses and two semi-detached council houses.In Plumpton there are quite a lot of houses most of which are semi-detached and detached and have big gardens. There are also a number of council houses.A large private estate was built in 1965 in East View Fields. Recently some bungalows were built by the railway station.Plumpton has four pubs The Plough,The Fountain,The Sun and The Half Moon.There is also a pub in East Chiltington called The Jolly Sportsman.
